body: Lol the last page marshmallow don't have anuses
... What level of wingwoman is this
its not the same mangaka as the original Otoyomegatari, hope someone translate the other works of uraura

Huzzah! An explicit canon compliant doujin for the best romance manga I know, with art that is close in style and quality to the original.
Nice to get some "vanilla" every once in a while.
